about_the_game:
Dive into the adrenaline-pumping world of "Agent Murphy," a relentless fast-paced platformer and side-scrolling action shooter that will test your skills to the limit. As Agent Murphy, you are armed with an impressive arsenal of weaponry to thwart your enemies' onslaught.

Game Features
  • Intense Action-Packed Gameplay: Engage in relentless fast-paced action as Agent Murphy, armed with an inexhaustible pistol, MP5, shotgun, and grenades, battling through hordes of randomly generated enemies in a side-scrolling platformer shooter.
  • Dynamic Challenges: Experience unpredictable encounters with randomly generated enemy types and weapons, keeping you on your toes and requiring quick adaptation and strategic thinking to survive.
  • Striking Pixel Art Visuals: Immerse yourself in a visually stunning world brought to life through colorful pixel graphics, capturing the essence of retro gaming nostalgia while delivering a modern and captivating aesthetic.
  • Epic Boss Battles: Conquer challenging boss encounters that demand precision, reflexes, and mastery of your arsenal, adding thrilling climactic moments to the 20 meticulously designed levels.
  • Immersive Clockwork Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in the game's atmosphere with a captivating clockwork-themed soundtrack that enhances the intensity of each level, further elevating the overall gaming experience.

name: Agent Murphy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Agent Murphy: Hardcore pixel platformer shooter with unlimited pistol, MP5, shotgun, and grenades. Navigate 20 levels, battle random enemies, and face epic bosses with a clockwork soundtrack.
